sent.orig: Despite my friendship with Frank, I tried not to take sides with him in his argument with his brother.
sent.trans: 尽管我和佛兰克好，却尽量在他们兄弟的争吵中不偏护他。

sent.orig: In ideological work, we must learn to open different locks with different keys because a method that answers with one person may not answer with another.
sent.trans: 做思想工作时，必须学会“一把钥匙开一把锁”，因为适用于一个人的方法不一定适用于另一个人。

sent.orig: Those embezzlers and grafters who are reckless with greed must be dealt with seriously in accordance with the policy.
sent.trans: 对那些利欲熏心的贪污盗窃分子，一定要按照政策严肃处理。

sent.orig: A and B are in love with each other.; A falls in love with B.
Care must be taken to unite with all those that can be united with.
sent.trans: 必须注意团结一切可以团结的人。
